SEARCH
Package repository

Class MedicineRepository

Object
MedicineRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<Medicine,String>
public class MedicineRepository extends Object implements Repository<Medicine,String>
The MedicineRepository class is responsible for managing a collection of medicine records. It allows for adding, retrieving, deleting, and querying medicines based on their properties. This class provides methods for finding medicines by name, checking for existence, and finding low stock items. It also supports clearing all records and provides a singleton pattern for global access.

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicineRepository

      private MedicineRepository()
      Private constructor to initialize the medicine repository. Uses a ConcurrentHashMap to store medicine records.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static MedicineRepository getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the MedicineRepository. If the instance does not exist, it will be created.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of MedicineRepository.

    • save

      public Medicine save(Medicine medicine)
      Saves a Medicine in the repository. If a medicine with the same name already exists, it will be overwritten.
      Specified by:
      save in interface Repository<Medicine,String>
      Parameters:
      medicine - The Medicine to save.
      Returns:
      The saved Medicine.

    • findById

      public Optional<Medicine> findById(String name)
      Finds a Medicine by its name.
      Specified by:
      findById in interface Repository<Medicine,String>
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the medicine to find.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the Medicine if found, or an empty Optional if not.

    • exists

      public boolean exists(String name)
      Checks if a Medicine with the specified name exists in the repository.
      Specified by:
      exists in interface Repository<Medicine,String>
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • findByName

      public Optional<Medicine> findByName(String name)
      Finds a Medicine by its name (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the medicine to search for.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the Medicine if found, or an empty Optional if not.

    • findLowStock

      public List<Medicine> findLowStock()
      Finds all medicines that have low stock based on their stock level and low stock alert threshold.
      Returns:
      A list of Medicine entries that are in low stock.
